name: numerologist
description: Numeroly - Vietnamese AI voicebot for Pythagorean numerology

scripts.start:api: cd apps/api && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn src.main:app --reload
scripts.test:api: cd apps/api && source venv/bin/activate && pytest tests/
scripts.lint:api: cd apps/api && source venv/bin/activate && flake8 src/
scripts.env:setup: cp .env.example .env && echo 'Created .env - please fill in your settings'
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d postgres redis
